titleStmt.title: W. J. Davis et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2406

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: To his Excellency Gov Beriah McGoffin of Ky

We the undersigned would respectfully represent to you that James A Birchfield late acting Justice of the Peace for Steritts Mill Precinct Warren County Ky departed this life the 21st of the present month by whose death a vacancy has occurred in said office of Justice of the Peace we citizens of said Precinct would respectfully Suggest the name of Peter A Reaves as a suitable person to fill said vacancy until the next May Election. the said Reaves has been acting heretofore as a Justice of the Peace for said Precinct & gave general satisfaction as such

W. T. Davis
Wm C Miller
L B Morgan
Benjamin Reaves
Alford Taylor
Jas Young
T B Martin
James Jones
D. D. Dixon
T. T. Rank
Robt Davis
Jos Herd
Alen Taylor
Thos Stuart
Lawson White
Philip Cole

Warren Co
J. P.
Dist No. 6.
P. M. Reaves
vice
J A Burchfield
